title: Decorated Globular Jar
description:
Squat globular jar with two broad string-hole handles on shoulder. Reddish pottery, decorated, in reddish brown painting, all over with spirals in neat rows; a central one on bottom; semi-circular strokes around neck; a dense criss-cross pattern on lip, radiating line on its underside. Rounded bottom. Straight mouth. Thin lip, flat-topped, underside bevelled to very short neck. Well potted.
Condition: Good. Two chip in bottom, one in one handle. Lip abraded around edge and slightly chipped. Some efflorescence.
dimensions: 5 1/2 x Greatest Diam. 7 5/8 in. (14 x 19.4 cm)

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
